languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} makes 7 attacks, each of which targets a random enemy in an 8-cell range and deals <u>(from 8 to 14)</u> warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Warp Channeller's Lore (Warp) skill.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Флагман{/g} совершает 7 атак, каждый раз выбирая случайного противника в радиусе 8 клеток и нанося <u>(от 8 до 14)</u> варп-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
Способность может быть использована только один раз за раунд.
Продолжительность: +1 раунд за каждые 10 очков навыка Знания: Варп у офицера на посту.

traits.locale_text:
The Flagship makes 7 attacks, each of which targets a random enemy in an 8-cell range and deals 8-14 warp damage.
Can be used once per round.

Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Warp Channeller's Lore (Warp) skill.

Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Warp Channeller's Lore (Warp) skill.

Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Warp Channeller's Lore (Warp) skill.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Флагман{/g} совершает 7 атак, каждый раз выбирая случайного противника в радиусе 8 клеток и нанося <u>(от 8 до 14)</u> варп-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
Способность может быть использована только один раз за раунд.
Продолжительность: +1 раунд за каждые 10 очков навыка Знания: Варп у офицера на посту.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} makes 7 attacks, each of which targets a random enemy in an 8-cell range and deals <u>(from 8 to 14)</u> warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Warp Channeller's Lore (Warp) skill.

languages.text:
Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} führt 7 Angriffe aus, von denen jeder auf einen zufälligen Feind in einer Reichweite von 8 Feldern zielt und <u>(8 bis 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Warp-Schaden{/g} verursacht.
Kann einmal pro Runde eingesetzt werden.
Dauer: +1 Runde für jeweils 10 Punkte "Wissen (Warp)" des Warp-Kanalisierers.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} makes 7 attacks, each of which targets a random enemy in an 8-cell range and deals <u>(from 8 to 14)</u> warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Warp Channeller's Lore (Warp) skill.

traits.locale_text:
Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} führt 7 Angriffe aus, von denen jeder auf einen zufälligen Gegner in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} von 8 Feldern zielt und 8-14 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warpschaden{/g} verursacht.
Kann einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eingesetzt werden.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} effectue 7 attaques, qui ciblent chacune un ennemi aléatoire dans une portée de 8 cases, et qui infligent <u>(entre 8 et 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} du Warp.
Utilisable une seule fois par round.
Durée : +1 round par tranche de 10 points pour la compétence Connaissance (Warp) du Maître de la canalisation du Warp.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} makes 7 attacks, each of which targets a random enemy in an 8-cell range and deals <u>(from 8 to 14)</u> warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Warp Channeller's Lore (Warp) skill.

traits.locale_text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} lance 7 attaques, chacune ciblant un ennemi aléatoire dans une {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} de 8 cases et infligeant 8 à 14 points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g}.
Utilisable une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}发动7次攻击，每次攻击选择8格射程内的随机敌人，造成<u>8-14</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}亚空间伤害{/g}。
每轮只能使用一次。
持续时间：亚空间引导者每有10点知识（亚空间）技能，持续时间延长一轮。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} makes 7 attacks, each of which targets a random enemy in an 8-cell range and deals <u>(from 8 to 14)</u> warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Warp Channeller's Lore (Warp) skill.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}发动7次攻击，每次攻击选择8格射程内的随机敌人，造成<u>8-14</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}亚空间伤害{/g}。
每轮只能使用一次。
持续时间：亚空间引导者每有10点知识（亚空间）技能，持续时间延长一轮。

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} lanza 7 ataques, cada uno de los cuales tiene por objetivo a un enemigo al azar en un <u>radio</u> de 8 casillas e inflige (de 8 a 14) de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño de disformidad{/g}.
Solo se puede usar una vez por asalto.
Duración: +1 asalto por cada 10 puntos de Conocimiento (disformidad) del Canalizador de la disformidad.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} makes 7 attacks, each of which targets a random enemy in an 8-cell range and deals <u>(from 8 to 14)</u> warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Warp Channeller's Lore (Warp) skill.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} lanza 7 ataques, cada uno de los cuales tiene por objetivo a un enemigo al azar en un {g|Encyclopedia:Range}radio{/g} de 8 casillas e inflige 8–14 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}.
Se puede usar una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が7回攻撃を行う。それぞれが8セル射程内のランダムな敵1体をターゲットとし、<u>（8～14）</u>のワープ{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
1ラウンドにつき1回のみ使用可能。
持続時間：ワープチャンネラーの伝承（歪み）スキル10ごとに+1ラウンド。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} makes 7 attacks, each of which targets a random enemy in an 8-cell range and deals <u>(from 8 to 14)</u> warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Warp Channeller's Lore (Warp) skill.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が7回攻撃を行う。それぞれが8セル射程内のランダムな敵1体をターゲットとし、<u>（8～14）</u>のワープ{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
1ラウンドにつき1回のみ使用可能。
持続時間：ワープチャンネラーの伝承（歪み）スキル10ごとに+1ラウンド。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisi{/g} 7 saldırı gerçekleştirir ve bunlardan her biri 8 hücrelik menzil içindeki rastgele bir düşmanı hedef alarak ona <u>(8 ila 14)</u> öteboyut {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} verir.
Her rauntta sadece bir kez kullanılabilir.
Süre: Öte Yönlendiren'in Kültür (Öteboyut) yeteneğindeki her 10 puan için +1 raunt.
